beforeHooks.title: "before each" hook in "Constructor Validation Tests"
beforeHooks.fullTitle: tests Challenge contract deployment Constructor Validation Tests "before each" hook in "Constructor Validation Tests"

tests.title: should revert with ZeroAddressToken when token address is zero
tests.fullTitle: tests Challenge contract deployment Constructor Validation Tests should revert with ZeroAddressToken when token address is zero
tests.code:
const Challenge = await ethers.getContractFactory('Challenge');
await expect(
    Challenge.deploy(
        signers[0].address,
        "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000", // Invalid token
        duration,
        maxPlayers,
        bid,
        description,
        signers[0].address,
        false,
        ethers.ZeroHash,
        "ipfsCid"
    )
).to.be.revertedWithCustomError(Challenge, "ZeroAddressToken");

tests.title: should revert with ZeroAddressFeeReceiver when feeReceiver address is 0
tests.fullTitle: tests Challenge contract deployment Constructor Validation Tests should revert with ZeroAddressFeeReceiver when feeReceiver address is 0
tests.code:
const Challenge = await ethers.getContractFactory('Challenge');
await expect(
    Challenge.deploy(
        signers[0].address,
        token.target, // Invalid token
        duration,
        maxPlayers,
        bid,
        description,
        "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000",
        false,
        ethers.ZeroHash,
        "ipfsCid"
    )
).to.be.revertedWithCustomError(Challenge, "ZeroAddressFeeReceiver");

tests.title: should revert with InvalidDuration when duration is 0
tests.fullTitle: tests Challenge contract deployment Constructor Validation Tests should revert with InvalidDuration when duration is 0
tests.code:
const Challenge = await ethers.getContractFactory('Challenge');
await expect(
    Challenge.deploy(
        signers[0].address,
        token.target,
        0n, // Invalid duration
        maxPlayers,
        bid,
        description,
        signers[0].address,
        false,
        ethers.ZeroHash,
        "ipfsCid"
    )
).to.be.revertedWithCustomError(Challenge, "InvalidDuration");

tests.title: should revert with InsufficientPlayers when maxPlayers = 1 (< 2) in LINK mode
tests.fullTitle: tests Challenge contract deployment Constructor Validation Tests should revert with InsufficientPlayers when maxPlayers = 1 (< 2) in LINK mode
tests.code:
const Challenge = await ethers.getContractFactory('Challenge');
await expect(
    Challenge.deploy(
        signers[0].address,
        token.target,
        duration,
        1n, // Invalid: less than 2
        bid,
        description,
        signers[0].address,
        false,
        ethers.ZeroHash,
        "ipfsCid"
    )
).to.be.revertedWithCustomError(Challenge, "InsufficientPlayers");

tests.title: should revert with InsufficientBid when bid is 0

tests.title: should emit an event when PlayerVoted
tests.fullTitle: tests Challenge contract Events should emit an event when PlayerVoted
tests.code:
const {challenge, signers} = await loadFixture(VotingForWinnerFixture)
await expect(challenge.voteForWinner(signers[1].address))
    .to.emit(challenge, "PlayerVoted")
    .withArgs(signers[0].address, signers[1].address)

tests.title: should create challenge with groupMode false and zero merkle root
tests.fullTitle: tests ChallengeFactory contract Group Mode Tests should create challenge with groupMode false and zero merkle root
tests.code:
await expect(
    challengeFactory.createChallenge(
        duration,
        maxPlayers,
        bid,
        description,
        false, // groupMode = false
        ethers.ZeroHash,
        "ipfsCid"
    )
).to.emit(challengeFactory, 'ChallengeCreated');
